titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the prohibition on collective bargaining with respect to matters and questions regarding compensation of employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs other than rates of basic pay, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on Health Prior to Referral.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 6/16/2010--Introduced. Prohibits collective bargaining with respect to matters and questions concerning rates of basic pay (under current law, concerning compensation) of employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA). (Permits collective bargaining concerning compensation, other than basic rates of pay, with respect to such employees.)
